hero.title: THE DJ THAT
hero.subtitle: Automate your airwaves. From jingle generation to seamless scheduling, Station-AI runs your broadcast so you don't have to.
hero.description: AI-powered radio station management for 24/7 autonomous operation

automation.title: Intelligent Flow Generation
automation.description: Type 'Friday Afternoon Chill,' and the Conductor weaves a perfect playlist of songs, ads, and transitions. It's not just shuffle; it's curation.

analytics.title: 24/7 Autonomous Operation
analytics.description: The Phantom Conductor never sleeps, never takes breaks, and never makes mistakes. Your station runs flawlessly around the clock.

voice.title: AI Voice Synthesis
voice.description: Generate station IDs, weather updates, and announcements in any voice. No human required.

scheduling.title: Smart Content Management
scheduling.description: Organize songs, shows, and commercials with intelligent categorization and rotation.

multilingual.title: Dual Language Support
multilingual.description: Full Hebrew (RTL) and English interface for Israeli and international broadcasters.

cloud.title: Cloud-Based Freedom
cloud.description: Access your station from anywhere. No hardware, no maintenance, just broadcasting.

faq.a1: Pricing is based on the number of stations, listener volume, and features required. Contact us for a custom quote tailored to your needs.
faq.q2: Can I upgrade my plan later?
faq.a2: Yes, you can upgrade at any time. We'll help migrate your content and settings seamlessly to the new plan.
faq.a3: All plans include email support. Professional and Enterprise plans include priority support with dedicated account managers.

commercial.title: Commercial Radio
commercial.challenge: Commercial stations need to maximize ad revenue while maintaining engaging programming that keeps listeners tuned in.
commercial.solution: Our AI optimizes playlist scheduling and ad insertion to maximize both listener retention and advertising revenue.

testimonial.quote: Olorin.ai Media Enrichment transformed our station operations. We've seen significant improvements in both listener engagement and ad revenue.
testimonial.author: Station Manager

music.title: Music Stations
music.challenge: Music stations struggle to create varied playlists that maintain listener interest without repetition.
music.solution: AI-curated playlists that adapt to listener preferences, ensuring fresh content that keeps audiences engaged.

talk.title: Talk Radio
talk.challenge: Talk radio requires precise show scheduling, guest management, and seamless transitions between segments.
talk.solution: Comprehensive show scheduling with automated segment handling, commercial breaks, and content management.

community.title: Community Radio
community.challenge: Community stations operate with limited budgets and volunteer staff, needing affordable, easy-to-use automation.
community.solution: Cost-effective automation that simplifies operations, allowing volunteers to focus on content creation rather than technical tasks.
